query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `signed_waivers` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `waiverTemplateId` int NOT NULL,
  `programId` int,
  `signerType` enum('student', 'guardian') NOT NULL,
  `signerName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `signerEmail` varchar(320),
  `signatureData` text NOT NULL,
  `pdfUrl` varchar(500),
  `ipAddress` varchar(45),
  `userAgent` text,
  `signedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `waiverTemplateId` int NOT NULL,
  `programId` int,
  `signerType` enum('student', 'guardian') NOT NULL,
  `signerName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `signerEmail` varchar(320),
  `signatureData` text NOT NULL,
  `pdfUrl` varchar(500),
  `ipAddress` varchar(45),
  `userAgent` text,
  `signedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
